title: Print, "Anger of the Lion (Shishi-Ikari), No. 22", ca. 1910
markings: In graphite, lower left: Anger of the Lion
inscribed: Inscribed in black ink, lower left: [Japanese characters] / no. 22 / Shishi-Ikari.
description: A large iris, outer perianth leaves deep red; inner leaves white with purple tips.

tombstone.epitaph:
Print, "Anger of the Lion (Shishi-Ikari), No. 22", ca. 1910.
ca. 1910. 41 x 27.9 cm (16 1/8 in. x 11 in.). Gift of Mary Rutherford Jay. 1948-134-76.
